title: SAF Consumption in the airline network with custom solver and model
description: Developed a mathematical model for optimizing sustainable aviation fuel distribution across airline networks to maximize emissions reductions while minimizing costs.

title: Collaborative Purchasing of Goods
description: Game Theory and Mechanism Design for Collaborative Purchasing of Goods. The project aims to develop a game-theoretic model for collaborative purchasing of goods utilizing Greenhouse Gas Protocol Scope 3 emissions rules.

title: Aviation Noise's affect on Boston
description: This study explores how noise levels from Boston Logan Airport propagate across neighborhoods in Boston and Cambridge. Using a scrollytelling format, users are guided through an interactive narrative that highlights the impact of airport noise on local communities.

title: SAF Location Optimization
description: Uses Gurobi and Julia to optimize the location of SAF production facilities in the US. The model minimizes costs while meeting SAF demand and feedstock supply.
